businessForm.title: Add Your Business to Geobooker
businessForm.subtitle: Complete your business information. Registration is currently <1>100% free</1>.
businessForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe what your business offers.
businessForm.invoicingDetails: Important invoicing information (Tax ID, hours, etc.)
businessForm.hasJobOpenings: Do you currently have job openings?
businessForm.jobOpeningsNote: We'll be able to show businesses that are hiring soon.
businessForm.successMessage: We've received your business information. It will be reviewed shortly and, once approved, will appear on Geobooker.
businessForm.validationError: Please complete at least the business name and category.
businessForm.submitError: There was an error submitting your business. Check the console.
businessForm.submitSuccess: üéâ Your business has been submitted. We'll review the information.
businessForm.termsAccept: By submitting your business you accept our <1>terms of service</1> and <3>privacy policy</3>.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Join Geobooker today
signup.success: Account created successfully! Check your email to confirm.
signup.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
signup.errorTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions

enterprise.seoTitle: Geobooker Enterprise - Global Advertising for International Brands
enterprise.seoDescription: Reach millions of users at events like FIFA 2026. Geolocated advertising for global brands.
enterprise.heroSubtitle: Your brand, where your customers are.
enterprise.featurePreciseDesc: Reach users in specific cities: Los Angeles, Miami, New York...
enterprise.featureMultilingualDesc: Your message in English, Spanish, French or your audience's language.
enterprise.featureEventsDesc: Sync campaigns with FIFA 2026, Super Bowl, festivals and more.
enterprise.featureAnalyticsDesc: Dashboard with metrics by city, device and time.
enterprise.featureSafetyDesc: Your brand in safe contexts aligned with your values.
enterprise.featureManagerDesc: A dedicated expert to optimize your campaign.
enterprise.pricingSubtitle: As one of our first enterprise clients, we offer you exclusive pricing. Valid while supplies last.
enterprise.securePayments: Secure payments via credit card or bank transfer.
enterprise.noCashNote: We don't accept cash to ensure proper tax invoicing.
enterprise.useCaseFifa: French wine brand promoting in Los Angeles, Dallas and Miami during the World Cup.
enterprise.useCaseSuperbowl: Mexican craft brewery reaching Hispanic audience in Phoenix.
enterprise.useCaseF1: European luxury brand promoting during the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
enterprise.ctaFinalTitle: Ready to scale your brand globally?
enterprise.ctaFinalSubtitle: Our enterprise sales team will contact you within 24 hours to design a personalized strategy.
enterprise.featureHoursDesc: Control your business hours from any device. Your customers will always know if you're available.
enterprise.featureAlwaysMapDesc: Your business visible 24/7 on Geobooker's interactive map. Never miss a potential customer.
enterprise.featureMultiLocationDesc: Manage multiple branches from a single dashboard. Unified reports and centralized control.
enterprise.featureReferralProgDesc: Integrated referral system: your customers invite, you win. Automatic rewards and real-time tracking.
enterprise.useCasePharmacy: Pharmacy chain announces opening of 10 new branches in Monterrey with geolocated campaign.
enterprise.useCaseBeverage: Energy drink brand activates exclusive promotions during music festival in Guadalajara.
enterprise.useCaseBank: Digital bank launches credit card for millennials with ads in university areas of CDMX.
enterprise.kpisSubtitle: Data Included in your Enterprise Contract
enterprise.kpisDesc: Total transparency. You will receive access to real-time metrics and personalized reports to optimize your campaigns.
enterprise.guaranteeDesc: If at any point you don't have access to your metrics or reports, we'll extend your campaign <1>+15 days for free</1>.
